contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We're here to help 24/7. Reach out through any of our support channels and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.description: We do not handle billing or account-related support via Discord. For privacy and security, please contact us at support@nodebyte.host for sensitive matters.

footer.tagline: Fast, reliable, scalable and secure hosting services for your gaming experience. Built for Humans. Powered by Bytes.

errorPage.title: Something Went Wrong
errorPage.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Don't worry, our team has been notified and is working on it.
errorPage.helpDescription: If this error persists, please reach out to our support team.

hero.title: Built by Gamers,
hero.description: NodeByte started as a small group of gamers and ops engineers who wanted hosting that was fast, reliable, and easy to manage. Today, we power game servers worldwide.

story.title: How It All Started
story.paragraph1: NodeByte was born from frustration. As avid gamers ourselves, we experienced firsthand the pain of laggy servers, unresponsive support, and complex control panels that made server management a nightmare.
story.paragraph2: In 2024, we decided enough was enough. We assembled a team of passionate gamers and experienced ops engineers with one goal: build the game hosting platform we always wished existed.
story.paragraph3: Today, NodeByte powers game servers across the globe. But our mission remains the same: make game server hosting fast, reliable, and accessible to everyone.

values.title: What We
values.description: Our core values guide everything we do, from infrastructure decisions to customer support.

players.title: Built for Players
players.description: Our infrastructure prioritizes low latency routing, predictable performance, and strong uptime so your communities stay online and responsive.

community.title: Community & Mod Support
community.description: Seamless mod installs, snapshot support, and community tooling to help you run modded worlds and persistent servers with minimal effort.

open.title: Open by Design
open.description: We value transparency from clear SLA commitments to open tooling. Our platform provides APIs and integrations to automate server workflows.

founded.title: NodeByte Founded
founded.description: Started as a small project by gamers who wanted better hosting options for their communities.

growth.title: Rapid Growth
growth.description: Expanded infrastructure with FyfeWeb partnership, adding enterprise DDoS protection and UK data centers.

expansion.title: Global Expansion
expansion.description: Launched new services, enhanced control panel, and continue growing our global community.

team.title: Meet the
team.description: The talented people behind NodeByte, committed to providing the best game hosting experience.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of gaming communities already hosting with NodeByte.

maintenance.title: We'll be right back
maintenance.description: We're currently performing scheduled maintenance to improve our services.
maintenance.estimatedTime: We expect to be back online soon
maintenance.contact: If you have any urgent questions, please contact our support team
maintenance.followSuggestion: Follow us on Discord for real time updates on maintenance status.
